actions.abilityText: If this attack is faster, shuffle one Goop card into your opponent's deck.~FASTER~

Put the top three cards of your opponent's deck into their discard pile. If any of these cards are Goop cards, this monster heals
2[HP].

If all buff slots are used, this attack gains
+1[ATK].

buffs.buffText:
If your opponent has three or more Goop cards, this monster gains
+2[DEF].
If not, shuffle one Goop card into your opponent's deck instead.

If your opponent has three or more Goop cards, this attack gains
+2[ATK].
If not, shuffle one Goop card into your opponent's deck instead.

If your opponent has three or more Goop cards, this attack gains
+3[SPD].
If not, shuffle one Goop card into your opponent's deck instead
Heavy. Shuffle two Goop cards into your opponent's deck.~HEAVY~

startOfGame:
At the start of the game, you gain
Gooped Up [TA].
abilityText: When this monster switches in, shuffle a Goop card into your opponent's deck.~SWITCH~

teamAura.name: Gooped Up
teamAura.text:
Whenever you attack with a faster
melee [MELEE]
attack, shuffle a Goop card into your opponent's deck.~FASTER~~AURA~
